text: hey folks this josh starting rich farmer welcome to the farm vlog today today is going to be pretty fun we're gonna be installing more solar lights and I know what you're thinking do you really coop at night I've got some pretty heavy-duty wire on there but I want to deter those predators from coming and what deters a predator more than being discovered ok so we're going to be installing
